entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 5 except plus 1 in onshore winds. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5 except plus 1 in onshore winds. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
